step_feedback.feedback: Your first repetition was a bit shaky, especially with your wrists. Focus on keeping your shoulders the main movers.
Much better! Your shoulder movement is smoother now. Try to keep your elbows a little closer to your body as you roll.
Great job on the final repetitions! Your shoulder blades are moving well. Remember to breathe deeply as you pull your shoulders back.

exercise_summary: You did a good job with the shoulder rolls! Your movement became much smoother after the first try. Keep focusing on squeezing your shoulder blades back and down, and remember to breathe deeply.
